title: 820-3115 Slow on Battery
message: Any idea what could cause a 3115 board to be slow on battery? PBUS sense is working fine - 2V on R5488. ASD fails whetstone test but nothing else. I've never seen this where it wasn't a PBUS sense issue.

title: 820-3115 Slow on Battery
message: only on battery is slow??? have you tried another known good battery??

title: 820-3115 Slow on Battery
message: Yeah, tried other batteries. Works great with adapter plugged in. Slows down by about 30-40% on battery - beach balls. Plugging it back in fixes the problem immediately. No liquid-damage at all to Q5480 area - PBUS circuit is fine.

title: 820-3115 Slow on Battery
message:
Could be ME issue. Try this BIOS, backup your original! 
[url]https://drive.google.com/open?id=0ByfhQ_x0v-tZYy1WaGhQNTVQME0[/url]
